infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: LifeX uses your location to find nearby businesses and provide personalized recommendations based on your area.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: LifeX needs camera access to allow you to take photos for business reviews and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: LifeX needs access to your photo library to let you select and upload images for business reviews and profile pictures.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: LifeX may need microphone access for voice features and video recording capabilities.
